<Tabs>
<TabItem label="JSX and TSX" icon="seti:javascript">
## Summary
- Rule available since: `v1.0.0`
- Diagnostic Category: [`lint/style/noImplicitBoolean`](/reference/diagnostics#diagnostic-category)
- This rule has a [**safe**](/linter/#safe-fixes) fix.
- The default severity of this rule is [**information**](/reference/diagnostics#information).
- Sources: 
  - Inspired from [`react/jsx-boolean-value`](https://github.com/jsx-eslint/eslint-plugin-react/blob/master/docs/rules/jsx-boolean-value.md)

## Description
Disallow implicit `true` values on JSX boolean attributes

## Examples

### Invalid

```jsx
<input disabled />
```

<pre class="language-text"><code class="language-text">code-block.jsx:1:8 <a href="https://biomejs.dev/linter/rules/no-implicit-boolean">lint/style/noImplicitBoolean</a> <span style="color: #000; explicit boolean values for boolean JSX props.</span><br />  <br />  <strong><span style="color: Tomato;">&gt;</span></strong> <strong>1 │ </strong>&lt;input disabled /&gt;<br />   <strong>   │ ### Valid

```jsx
<input disabled={false} />
```

```jsx
<input disabled={''} />
```

```jsx
<input disabled={0} />
```

```jsx
<input disabled={undefined} />
```

```jsx
<input disabled='false' />
```

## How to configure
```json title="biome.json"
{
	"linter": {
		"rules": {
			"style": {
				"noImplicitBoolean": "error"
			}
		}
	}
}

```
